notes: Implemented grid and carousel view toggle for recommendations and watchlist picks.
Overhauled navigation bar.
Improved share image functionality and added option to download recommendations and watchlist picks as a Letterboxd-import-compatibile CSV.
Added genre compatibility score, shared favorites, and polarizing watches on compatibility page.
Improved UI for movie recommendations and watchlist picks.
Updated export images.
Improved efficiency of movie data update script.
Minor SEO improvements.
Created a compatibility page that determines the similarity between the rating patterns of two Letterboxd profiles.
Minor organizational and naming changes.
Miscellaneous SEO updates.
Added an option to generate predicted ratings from user-input Letterboxd movie URLs using their personalized recommendation model.
Minor UI/UX improvements.
Fixed issues with the domain and site-indexing.
Added a rewatches filter that allows rewatches to be recommended if toggled on (only available for group suggestions).
Added a highly-rated filter that only includes movies with a Letterboxd rating â‰¥ 3.5 if toggled on.
Overhauled the popularity filter.
Fixed bugs involving misapplied genre filters, incorrect recommendations, unnecessary rate limiting, and profile scraping.
Increased server request timeout limits.
Migrated backend server deployment from Render to Amazon Lightsail.
Increased backend server RAM to 1GB.
Improved memory efficiency.
Set maximum filter description length to 50 tokens.
Filter description can now only be used on one username due to memory constraints.
Integrated OpenAI's GPT-5 Nano to enable users to generate recommendation filters through natural language descriptions.
Improved watchlist picker performance by caching user watchlists.
Implemented reasonable rate-limiting to stabilize server capacity.
Deprecated the general recommendation model and model type filter.
Improved SEO by updating the site description and adding llms.txt.
Various performance improvements.
Performed EDA on training features of movie data.
Simplified long-term maintenance improvements by adding docstrings and IDE configuration settings.
Added an MIT license.
Created a general recommendation model designed to generate suggestions based on the rating habits of a typical Letterboxd user.
Updated the FAQ.
Minor tweaks and improvements in codebase organization.
Implemented caching for movie data with an automatic monthly reset when the movie data is updated.
Implemented temporary caching for user ratings, improving response times for repeated requests by up to 10x.
Improved server efficiency and memory consumption.
Updated the FAQ.
Fixed critical bug that prevented some movies from being used in the recommendation model and user statistics.
Improved content type labeling on movies and TV shows in the dataset.
Increased functionality of script to scrape movie data.
Created a release notes page.
Fixed bug with watchlist recommendations.
Automated movie data update now occurs only on the 15th of each month.
Added a content type filter allowing users to generate recommendations for movies, TV shows, or both.
Added support to export recommendations, statistics, and the rating distribution as PNG images.
Miscellaneous UI improvements and bug fixes.
Slightly improved watchlist picker efficiency.
Implemented typing in the backend.
Improved search engine optimization (SEO).
Integrated Google AdSense.
Automated movie data updates now occur only on the 7th and 22nd of each month.
Added recommendations for user watchlists.
Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes.
Redesigned the statistics page.
Rating distribution can be downloaded on a desktop.
Changed runtime filter to allow the user to specifiy the minimum and maximum runtimes.
Improved efficiency while calculating user statistics.
Improved error handling and error messages.
Cleaned up old code.
Created a metrics page displaying the cumulative number of users over time.
Redesigned the website UI.
Fixed a bug with the profile statistics feature.
Further improved efficiency while generating movie recommendations.
Various minor improvements.
Improved efficiency while generating movie recommendations.
Redesigned the filter definitions on the movie recommendations page.
Minor improvements.
Slightly reduced server memory consumption while generating recommendations based on multiple user profiles.
Minor bug fixes.
Redesigned the movie recommendation display to include movie posters.
Shortened the placeholder text telling to separate usernames by comma.
Updated the FAQ.
Multiple usernames are now processed through the same input field and must be separated by commas when using the movie recommendations or watchlist picker.
Created a FAQ page.
The release year filter has been changed to allow users to specifiy the start and end release year of generated recommendations.
The default popularity filter is now set to include the movies ranked in the top 20% of popularity.
There is now an additional, more promiment link to submit feedback in the center of the recommendations page.
